<item> <guid isPermaLink="false"><%# Eval("NodeGUID") %></guid> <title><%# EvalCDATA("BlogPostTitle") %></title> <description><%# EvalCDATA("BlogPostSummary") %></description> <pubDate><%# GetRSSDateTime(Eval("BlogPostDate")) %></pubDate> <link><![CDATA[<%# GetAbsoluteUrl(GetDocumentUrlForFeed(), Eval<int>("NodeSiteID")) %>
</link> </item>
